bill.summary: Expresses disapproval of the President's request for the extension of certain trade authorities procedures to any implementing bill submitted with respect to any trade agreement entered into after June 30, 2018, under specified provisions of the Bipartisan Congressional Trade Priorities and Accountability Act of 2015.
